sense.def:
To move through a hole or opening
pomeni iti naravnost od ene strani luknje ali odprtine do druge.

seg.quote: Go straight through that door and then turn right.
No one can get their hand through.

sense.def:
To cut through something
pomeni nekaj, na primer vrv, prerezati, tako da razpade na dva dela.

seg.quote: The fish must have chewed right through it.
It went through like a knife through butter.

sense.def:
To move through a place or area
pomeni iti skozi neki kraj ali območje ali prek njega.

seg.quote: We drove through London.
We decided to drive straight through to Birmingham.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
passes through an object
, gre v sredino predmeta in pride ven na drugi strani.

seg.quote: ...a hat with a feather stuck through it.

sense.def:
To see, hear, or feel something through a particular thing
, je tista stvar med nami in tistim, kar lahko vidimo, slišimo ali čutimo.

seg.quote: Lonnie gazed out through a side window.
I can hear John snoring right through the partition.
She could feel the gravel through the soles of her slippers.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
happens through a period of time
, se dogaja od začetka do konca nekega obdobja.

seg.quote: I wished that I could stay through the winter.
We had no rain from March right through to October.

sense.def:
To go through an experience
pomeni, da nekaj doživimo.

seg.quote: He didn't want to go through all that divorce business again.

sense.def:
To live through a historical event
pomeni, da se neki zgodovinski dogodek zgodi v času našega življenja.

seg.quote: He lived through the decline of the Liberal Party.

sense.def:
To be through with something
pomeni, da nečesa ne delamo več ali da pri nečem ne želimo več sodelovati.

seg.quote: He was through with seminars and tutorials.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
through something else
, se zgodi zaradi nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: Many people have difficulty in walking, for example through age or frailty.
They were opposed to change through violence.

sense.def:
To go through
ali
to look through a lot of things
pomeni, da veliko stvari opravimo drugo za drugo.

seg.quote: I wanted to read through as much information as possible.
She was sorting through a pile of socks.

sense.def:
Izraza
halfway through
in
all the way through
povesta, v kolikšnem obsegu je neka dejavnost ali naloga opravljena.

seg.quote: Harris tried to stop the operation halfway through.
I do not think she ever saw a play right through.

cit.quote: popolnoma, do konca, čez in čez

seg.quote: Those boards are rotten through and through.
